short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks site URLs of websites to prevent opening the same link twice. Closes duplicate tabs and selects the old tab instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabify is your go-to solution for a clutter-free browsing experience! This innovative extension intelligently monitors your open tabs, preventing the hassle of accidentally opening the same link multiple times. Say goodbye to tab overload as Tabify automatically closes duplicate tabs and seamlessly redirects you to the original one.

Key Features:

Smart URL Monitoring: Tabify continuously checks site URLs to identify and prevent the opening of duplicate links across your browsing session.

Effortless Tab Management: No more manual tab cleanups! Tabify efficiently closes redundant tabs, keeping your browser organized and responsive.

Customizable Settings: Tailor your experience with Tabify's extensive settings. Choose to ignore specific query parameters, anchor tags, or exclude certain websites from duplicate tab management.

Seamless Redirection: When a duplicate tab is closed, Tabify automatically selects the existing tab, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted browsing flow.

User-Friendly Interface: Tabify integrates seamlessly into your browser, providing a hassle-free experience without intruding on your workflow.
